question: Kritadasas' referred to which of the following type of slaves during the early medieval period?
option1: Persons who were reduced to the status of slaves.
option3: Persons who sold themselves as slaves.
option4: Persons who were captured by the victorious rulers as prisoners of war.
explanation: Slavery as an institution existed during the early medieval period. Those slaves who had been purchased were referred to as Kritdasas. There seems to have been existence of trade in slaves during that period.
